books.author: by Patricia Cornwell
books.description: The chief medical examiner Kay Scarpetta investigates a string of killings linked to the murder of her former deputy.
books.name: RED MIST

books.author: by Kathryn Stockett
books.description: A young white woman and two black maids in 1960s Mississippi.
books.name: THE HELP

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: An English teacher travels back to 1958 by way of a time portal in a Maine diner. His assignment is to stop Lee Harvey Oswald.

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: Partners in a small law firm take on a big case after a fast-track burnout joins them.
books.name: THE LITIGATORS

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: Harry Bosch of the L.A.P.D. uncovers both the operations of a sadistic killer and a political conspiracy.
books.name: THE DROP

books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: Alex Cross investigates when the president’s children are kidnapped, but the F.BI. and C.I.A. stand in his way.
books.name: KILL ALEX CROSS

books.author: by P. D. James
books.description: Six years after Elizabeth Bennet and Darcy marry, their comfortable life is shaken by a murder, as James recreates the world of “Pride and Prejudice” with a mysterious twist.
books.name: DEATH COMES TO PEMBERLEY

books.author: by Janet Evanovich
books.description: After a disastrous vacation in Hawaii, Stephanie Plum becomes the target of an international killer.
books.name: EXPLOSIVE EIGHTEEN

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: A hacker and a journalist investigate the disappearance of a Swedish heiress 40 years earlier.
books.name: THE GIRL WITH THE DRAGON TATTOO

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A man and woman who have gone their separate ways return to their Southern town for the funeral of a friend.
books.name: THE BEST OF ME

books.author: by Sue Grafton
books.description: Pursuing a shoplifter, Kinsey Millhone discovers that retail crime is run by organized gangs.
books.name: V IS FOR VENGEANCE

books.author: by Lora Leigh
books.description: Adversaries are drawn to each other in this Breed novel.
books.name: LAWE'S JUSTICE

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: A military investigator uncovers a conspiracy.
books.name: ZERO DAY

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: A historic hotel in Boonsboro, Md., is getting a face-lift from the Montgomery brothers and their eccentric mother.
books.name: THE NEXT ALWAYS

books.author: by Michael Crichton and Richard Preston
books.description: Students miniaturized by an evil entrepreneur battle insects in a Hawaiian rain forest.
books.name: MICRO
